data.title: Film Fun Annual 1953, Used
data.meta_description: Film Fun Annual 1953 and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Good. 1st Edition. 95pp, lacks dust wrapper as issued, name only in book belongs to box, crossword partially filled in in pencil, no other inscriptions, illustrated. Boards in good order with some rubbing to edges, especially corners and top and bottom of spine, crease to top front corner. Text is clean, just some spotting to edge of text block and the end papers, one or two dirty marks to page edges, hinges are loose, no loose pages or turned over page corners. Overall a nice condition reading copy. Heavy book please inquire for postage outside the UK.

Hardback. Condition: Very Good. No Jacket. 1953. Almost very good condition with no wrapper. Cloth spine. Colour pictorial boards. B/w illustrations. Spine bumped. Covers edge worn with slight loss of paper covering to corners. Front joint is cracked showing webbing, possible loss of free-endpaper? Some small page edge tears and light page edge browning. Packaged with care and promptly dispatched!.

Cloth Spine/Pictorial Board. Condition: Good (contents Very Good). No Jacket. Pictorial Illustrations Throughout. (illustrator). This is the first edition of this edition. Crossword in book is filled in with pencil by a previous owner. Title page has a tear at the bottom left hand corner near spine ca. 2 inches long. This book will be POSTED AT OUR STANDARD RATES FULLY INSURED (UK) ONLY . Please email for further details. OFFERED FOR SALE BY A FULL-TIME STOCKHOLDING CAREER BOOKSELLER WHO TELLS YOU WHO THEY ARE AND WHAT THEIR TELEPHONE AND ADDRESS CONTACT DETAILS ARE! POSTED AT OUR STANDARD RATES FULLY INSURED! (UK ONLY). FEEL FREE TO E-MAIL FOR PHOTOGRAPHS AND FURTHER DETAILS. Size: 4to - over 9¾" - 12". Not Signed or Inscribed. HARDBACK.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Pictorial hard boards: 27.5x20.5cm. 95 pages. Spine is intact. Boards have bumping at the corners. Front end paper is price-clipped. "This Book belongs to" is filled in. Clean & tight. NO JACKET. Dispatched ROYAL MAIL FIRST CLASS with TRACKING next working day or sooner securely boxed in cardboard. ref G22.1.

Pictorial Board. Condition: Very Good (AVERAGE ). No Jacket. Cartoon Illustrations (illustrator). First Edition. Stories include: Laurel & Hardy, Old Mother Riley, Abbott & Costello, Jack Keen Detective Mystery etc. FEEL FREE TO E-MAIL FOR PHOTOGRAPHS AND FURTHER DETAILS. FROM A DEALER WHO TELLS YOU WHO THEY ARE AND WHAT THEIR TELEPHONE AND ADDRESS CONTACT DETAILS ARE!. Inscribed By Previous Owner. Annual.

Pictorial Boards. Condition: Very Good. Profusely Illustrated (illustrator). This copy is being sold on behalf of the Holly Hedge Animal Sanctuary, Barrow Gurney, Bristol. Laurel and Hardy, Abbott and Costello, Frank Randle, Bill Boyd, Old Mother Riley, Joe E. Brown,comic strips plus fiction adventure stories in text. Black cloth spine.Board corners rubbed.Cadbury Cocoa Game on rear board. Not priceclipped-"6/6 net". "Book belongs to" neatly filled in in pen.Crossword NOT filled in, ink mark on opposite page.Facsimile of front page of Film Fun comic on rear pastedown. 94 pages.A lovely VG+ tight, bright, interesting copy. Size: 4to - over 9¾" - 12" tall. Hard Cover.
